query: Please help arrange a 5-day trip for a group of 3. The journey will start in Santa Ana and will include visits to 2 distinct cities in Texas. The expected travel dates are from March 27th to March 31st, 2022. We have a budget of $6,000 and prefer to stay in entire rooms. Please note that we require accommodations that allow smoking. We will not be self-driving during the trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Austin,Dallas]
